scripts.test:local: export NODE_ENV=test DB_DIALECT=postgres DB_HOST=localhost DB_DATABASE=postgres DB_USER=postgres DB_PASSWORD=postgres DB_PORT=5431 INTEGRATION_TEST_HOST_URL=http://localhost:3002 TZ=utc && npm run test:local:migration && mocha spec --recursive --timeout 10000 --exit
scripts.test:local:migration: npm run sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && npm run sequelize db:migrate && npm run sequelize db:seed:all
